评论详情: Material is amazing! It fits perfectly asides from the shoulders as it gaps up in the back. The cost is good too!!

It is beautiful but I did have problems. I received it with a stain that took several washed to get out. The sizing does run big even after you wash it. It has belt loops at the top but it didn’t some with one. It is see through so I would be careful with what you wear underneath. It is long but I was able to wear boots and it not cause any issues. The top clasps did keep coming undone through me wearing it. Other than that it was a good baby shower outfit to wear.

评论概述: Bought this dress for my 21st birthday
评论详情: I love this dress i wore it for my 21st birthday and it’s not see through. only wore tights since it was cold

This dress is a super cute free people dupe, and by far more affordable! I’m 5’7 170lb pregnant, and ordered medium. I love the length and the fit is loose and flowy. The straps adjust and the hardware is good.  The quality is great, and soft against my skin. The material is light. The slip underneath does great. It’s only see-through at the bottom where the slip stops, which is very pretty, delicate looking, yet holds up around the action of children at a family reunion for thanksgiving.  I have toddlers and got gravy and cranberry sauce on it (dress is light cream color). I washed on a regular cycle, and the dress looks brand new! The lace trim and everything held its shape and placement perfectly.  I bought another color I was so pleased with the durability and quality of this dress!
I like that it is really comfy and cute at the same time

I ordered this dress, but it got lost in the mail, So I returned it. Then I received it a little later and the company was good to me and let me just keep it. It is a really cute dress, it fit just right. Thank you for the cute dress.
Love this dress. Great fit fall or any season really but I got the orange for fall. Love it. But it!
Love this jumper! Great quality. Rich burnt orange color. I love the look of the lace with the unique straps. So many compliments!!!
This is adorable. I ordered in a brown and think I will go for the pink also. Very flowy an a great fit.
Such a cute dress for summer and fall (: super flowy and fits perfectly 🖤
Good material, beautiful fabric , romantic style . Runs big. Love it
Cute, looks like picture. Took forever to arrive but other than that, worth the wait.
Love love love!! I’m 5’3 wearing a small

This dress is so adorable! I wore it to an Ann Wilson concert and SHE complimented me on the dress when I met her backstage!!! It has many details. It is a little large around the waist so I might recommend wearing a belt with it or something to cinch around your waist! Very comfortable, even for hot summer concerts!!
This dress is adorable but very sheer and my legs are long so the lining stopped way too short for my middle aged taste

Look at the pics in two different lights, you can see how sheer this fabric is. I'm gonna add fabric to make the dress not sheer. I was so excited to get this dress but it just needs too much work to be worth it. 😩

评论概述: So fun to wear! Lightweight flowing whimsical dress A+++
评论详情: This is the cutest little overall dress!! I saw it (as I am sure you are now if you are a jumper/overall lady like me and your eyes are popping right out of their sockets at the moment of how cute this is).  Size I am about 145lbs-150lbs 5’4 34C curvy athletic body I went with a Medium and it fits perfectly. The dress style is loose and comfortable (long A-Line type of dress). That said, I do buy clothes often in size large if it looks like the item might run smaller. This dress does not run small it is right on the money. If I got it in large I would be swimming in it and if I went with a small for a more fitted look well It would take away the forgiving comfort aspect of the overall look and feel.  I was trying to figure out what color to get but I gravitated towards the “white” color even though the apricot looks very boho/mountain/old fashioned country style (I like that too!) but I choose white and I am very satisfied.  As far as “see through” don’t wear black underwear and you should be fine, if you are worried about it you can double up on a slip and put a short slip on under the one that is build into the dress.  I find the material to be very breathable, comfortable, and lightweight in a good way (not in a cheep way)  Bottom line if you see this and your heart skips a beat like OH MY GOODNESS that is cute, and you have the right body shape for this style and or you have a piece of clothing that you are able to slightly compare this to that has worked for you in the past, I would say take a leap of faith and try it out.  Enjoy! And hope to see one of you wonderful ladies out there wearing this so we can be overall dress twins! PEACE <3

评论概述: This dress is beautiful ! lOVE it ! Fits great; BUT,
评论详情: ...the lower piece of the dress is sewed on inside out ! The wrong side is facing out... is anyone else's like that ? Wondering if I return it and buy another if if, too, will be like that.
I wore this and received so many compliments. It fit well, it’s cute…just like the picture! Now I’m ordering it in different colors!

I have the actual Free People version of this dress, which I love, although the price was pretty steep.  When I saw these I figured id try them.  Like so many of our clothes these are made with a much cheap polyester fabric.  They look nice on and are lighter weight than the original.  Really not a bad buy for the price!

评论概述: A really cute free people dupe
评论详情: I looked like some kinda indie princess every time I wore this and everybody wanted one. I actually wanted it bc some other girl had one and I'm like *how* do I get that dress.. she was nice enough to share the link!
This jumper is very well made and super stylish.  You can down dress it with a tank top or wear it for a special event with a more formal top.  I love it and will purchase more of them!
This dress is so freaking cute!!! It's flowy and comfy. I always get lots of compliments on it. It's great quality and the material is light. Highly recommend this dress.

This is such a cute outfit! Can be casual or dressed up. Very cozy to wear. Fabric is good quality. Fits a little loose but that’s the style. You can see through from your knees down. It has a slip inside that stops above the knee. After washing I hung it to dry, it didn’t fade or shrink. I like it so much I bought another in a different color.
Always getting compliments when I wear it.  Wish it had pockets but other than that I love this dress. I ended up buying it in two colors.

This came a few weeks ago and it was packaged great. I took it out and I washed it and it is so pretty. I wore it to her friends, baby shower and I thought it looked really cute and it was really super comfortable. It was easy to wash up and didn’t stain, right had spilled watermelon on it. I didn’t have to iron it either so that was perfect.
Very pretty and very cute.I'm going to order another one in another color Cute and elegant.
The perfection love it that’s great
These are very cute, but the lace on the top of the dress sticks out on the sides and does not lay nice.

Seeing as this purchase was based off of a TikTok post, I’m thoroughly impressed. The material is very nice and comfortable. I haven’t worn it besides trying it on but super excited to wear this! The dress is very versatile and can go with a lot of different styles and colors!!
I’m usually a xs and the xs was huge on me not nearly as flattering as I was hoping

This dress is absolutely adorable. The quality of the material is great. However, I am 5'3 with large hips. I ordered a medium which fit loose (like the photo) but due to my body type it was not flattering at all. The bib was a perfect fit, cute and everything. The bottom was extremely big and made me look like I was hiding a circus under my dress. Nevertheless it's the cutest dress ever. Just not for me :( I will be returning.
So cute and comfy. I get compliments everywhere I go when wearing this dress. I would buy in every color if I could.
Love the fit and the quality fabric was not what I expected. Most polyester is cheap but this does not disappoint. Highly recommend
Fit great.

It's great because it can be dressed up or dressed down, I washed it on delicates and it came out perfect no wrinkles or shrinkage. It's one of my favorite dresses now. The apricot color is VERY light but it does a pretty good job of not showing anything, and I'm usually a medium and ordered a small, there is quite a bit of room so sizing is very lenient!
Loved the fit and style. Hoping to wear with boots

This is cute and casual. It washes well. It is very comfortable. It is more sheer than I expected. There is a built in slip, but it ends right above the knee. If the slip was a bit longer, I would give it five stars.
I want to get it in every color.  Light and airy material but cute buckle and top.  I'm petite 5'1" and it's so hard finding dresses that don't drag on the floor.  This is perfect.
Beautiful dress. A lil over priced but over all good.

Not see through slip is a soft poly not crunchy like some reviews it is the best dupe for FP the only difference is it’s not cotton… it is flowy…for a fraction of FP I can live with soft poly…I’m going to wear a brown leather belt with it (has loops) and cowgirl boots and maybe a hat…I plan on wearing a lace see through top over a cami to finish the look…I’m 5’2 and 120 pounds it hits at my ankles but goes shorter with belt…I purchased a small it fits perfect with a little extra room (I’m a 38D) run don’t walk this is a great dupe 😃
Very cute with intricate detail but runs very large. I ordered a small and it’s still very big.
Love this free people dupe! I’m a teacher and this can be worn to school, a great perk. I bought the apricot and it’s not see through. If you’re on the fence buy it!
Love it. Haven’t worn yet but can’t wait until I can. Well made.

This dress took some time to arrive but when it did it was worth it.  Such cute details at straps and top part of “overalls”.  Dress material is light and breezy.  Lining is short so helps keep it cool when wearing.

This is exactly like the FP dress for a fraction of the price. I LOVE it! I’m 5’8/170 # and the large is perfect and flowy. The fabric is such good quality! It’s the dress of my hippie dreams!! Absolute perfection!
Was excited to get this free People Dupe. Don’t waste your money, 5x larger than specified. The clips don’t stay latched and constantly falling out and have to pray the dress doesn’t fall down

This is stunning - you never know on apparel but this was a win. I wished I would have gotten a small, I bought a medium worried it would be tiny but , it’s not ! I still rock the oversized look BUT at certain angles I worry you can see my underwear.

评论概述: Adorable!!  Runs small in the chest area
评论详情: I loved this as soon as I pulled it out of the package.  But.... when I tried it on, it was way tooooooo tight in the chest.  I ordered the 2xl. size chart said 48".  But it was way too small.  This dress is frilly, cute, would look great with a small top and sandals or leggings and a turtle neck in winter...  Sad I missed out on this one.  Had to return.
My new favorite! So comfortable and I get a lot of compliments every time I wear this!

评论概述: Best for summer and so many compliments!
评论详情: I bought this dress after pining over another more expensive version for yearrrrs- hoping the price would drop but atlas it never did. Then I found this perfect “knock off” it’s perfectly the look I’ve been wanting! I wore it the other day and received so many compliments! I will be buying a few more in different colors and sharing the link with my friends.

This is the cutest dress I own! I wore it when I went to Napa wine tasting. I love the design and the flow of the dress!! I highly recommend. The quality is great and it’s just like a Free People dress!

The material is fine honestly wasn’t too worried about that, it took forever to get here. The sender was from a facility that isn’t even in business, but there was also a label from China under that one so I had no idea it was this dress. The straps are so short, I can’t make them any longer the pictures above are the longest they will go, the straps length look NOTHING like the picture. The rest of it however looks like the pictures. I would not buy another one, I also got an XL but fits like a Med I’m assuming because the straps are so short. Aside from that the lace details are pretty nice actually and the fabric is pretty nice feeling.

评论概述: It’s hot and I mean temperature wise
评论详情: This is an adorable dress but the fabric is way too hot and heavy. It looks float and light but it’s not. You will roast in this in no time. Too bad, it’s really cute.

Super cute dress! My only complaints are that the picture shows black straps on the black dress, I thought it had pockets, and there are weird loops along the backside where the denim meets the sheer. Wish the slip was a bit longer, as I have a long torso. Fits comfortably. For reference, I am 5’6” and 194 lbs. I bought a large and it’s roomy. Not sure I would have paid full price, I got it for 20% off. Happy with it.

The fabric was odd. Whoever compared it to the linen Free People dress was so off the mark on this one. It reminded me of a wedding cake with each layer more stacked and not really flowing into the other one.
Love this dress! Great dupe and wayyyy cheaper than the name brand
This is super cute. I do wish it was a little more fitted , but if you love flowy dresses, you'll love this. Fits true to size and not see thru.
Loved this on line; but ran a bit large; material; dress and slip; were very stiff. No movement. I was really bummed out because I loved it😢

So as for the dress itself, SUPER cute. I did however have to cut the straps, turn the buckle the RIGHT way and sew it back together. If I wasn't a sewer I would have had to return this due to the straps being backwards. For this reason I only gave it 2 stars
I love this Free People dupe affordable and so cute to dress up or down!
This dress is adorable For the price I was impressed with the quality
Didn’t like material
Absolutely adorable 🤩

评论概述: Cute and flowy but not the most comfortable fabric

I tried on the actual Free People original. It was cute but I couldn’t bring myself to spend nearly 300.00. This is so very close to the original at about 15% of the cost. It actually fits better than the original. Runs a tiny bit large. Go for it. It’s pretty darn cute.

Cute dress, sheer on bottom delicate but sturdy. Coffee is more espresso in shade and purple in light, more off a fall color.

I order the coffee color dress love it. It is a dress but it looks like overalls very cute and beautiful look, the dress has a lining it is not see through so when I wear it I don't need to worry. also it has a front pocket I used to put my phone there very convenient . The other thing I like this dress I don't need to worry about I loose weight or gained weight it still fit me no need to waste money to buy other dress. I purchased this color thinking it was a bit of a dusky purple/brown color. However, it arrived just a deep dark chocolate brown. Ordered the XXL and I would say it it true to size. I'm a torrid 2 and old navy xxl, for reference. There is a short inner lining that forms to your shape, which ends high thigh, for the sheer embroidered aesthetic to peer through the bottom. This dress is amazing and well made. Nice fabric

I was worried about this being a gross low quality fabric and craftsmanship but I was pleasantly surprised. It fits well (I’m a size 18/20 and a bit busty) and it is true to picture. The straps are super cute and very adjustable (sorry that’s all I have a picture of). Love it.
